title: Government-approved construction company website

requirements.text: Create a responsive multi-page website for a government-approved construction company with the following pages/sections and English user-facing text: Home (hero + value proposition), About (company overview), Services, Projects/Portfolio, Government Approvals & Compliance (approval statement, certification/permit list, approval/registration numbers as text fields), Safety & Quality, and Contact (address/phone/email + contact form).

quotes: create  website for constructions site which is by government approved

acceptanceCriteria: Site includes navigation to Home, About, Services, Projects, Government Approvals & Compliance, Safety & Quality, and Contact sections/pages.
All pages render correctly on mobile and desktop and use English text.
Government Approvals & Compliance section includes clearly labeled fields for approval/registration details (with placeholder values that can be edited later).

requirements.text: Implement a coherent visual theme suitable for a government-approved construction brand (professional, trustworthy, industrial) and apply it consistently across typography, spacing, colors, buttons, cards, and section layouts (avoid blue/purple as dominant colors).

quotes: create  website for constructions site which is by government approved

acceptanceCriteria: The site uses a consistent design system (colors, type scale, component styles) across all pages.
Primary palette is not dominated by blue/purple.
All major sections have clear hierarchy, readable contrast, and consistent spacing.

requirements.text: Add a reusable header (logo + navigation) and footer (quick links, contact details, business hours, and compliance disclaimer text) visible across the site.

quotes: create  website for constructions site which is by government approved

acceptanceCriteria: Header and footer appear consistently across all pages/sections.
Navigation highlights the current section/page and works on mobile (collapsible menu).
Footer contains a short disclaimer indicating approvals/certifications are subject to verification and may vary by project (placeholder wording editable later).

requirements.text: Create a Projects/Portfolio section with a grid of project cards (title, location, year, short description, and image) and a project detail view/modal for each item using local seed data (no external API).

quotes: create  website for constructions site which is by government approved

acceptanceCriteria: Projects list displays at least 6 seeded project entries.
Each project card shows the required fields and an image.
Users can open a project detail view from the grid and return back easily.

requirements.text: Implement a Contact form that allows visitors to submit inquiries (name, email, phone, subject, message) and persist submissions in the Motoko backend canister.

quotes: create  website for constructions site which is by government approved

acceptanceCriteria: Contact form validates required fields and shows inline error messages.
On successful submission, the UI shows a confirmation state and clears the form.
Submissions are stored in the backend with an ID and timestamp and can be fetched back via a backend method.

requirements.text: Add a simple admin-only page to view submitted contact inquiries (list view + detail view) protected by Internet Identity login; only authenticated users can access the admin route.

quotes: create  website for constructions site which is by government approved

acceptanceCriteria: Admin page is not accessible when logged out (redirect or access denied state).
When logged in, admin can see a list of inquiries stored in the backend and open an inquiry detail view.
Unauthenticated users cannot read inquiries from the UI.

requirements.text: Add basic SEO and trust signals: set page titles/metadata per page, include a prominent 'Government Approved' badge/mark on the Home page, and include an Approvals & Compliance summary block on the Home page that links to the full compliance page.

quotes: create  website for constructions site which is by government approved

acceptanceCriteria: Each page has an appropriate document title.
Home page includes a visible government-approval badge/mark and a short compliance summary block with a link to the compliance page/section.
Compliance page contains the expanded approvals/certification content referenced on Home.

requirements.text: Integrate required generated images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them in the UI (no backend image serving).

quotes: create  website for constructions site which is by government approved

acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated and render correctly in the relevant sections.
Images are loaded directly by the frontend and are not proxied through the backend.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (all backend logic in backend/main.mo).
Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose components instead).
Do not edit immutable hook/bootstrapping files listed by the platform (use safe wrappers/components where needed).
Do not use any third-party authentication providers; only Internet Identity is allowed.
nonGoals: Implementing real-time chat or live project updates.
Integrating external government databases/APIs for automatic approval verification.
Adding e-commerce, payments, or client portals beyond the simple admin inquiries viewer.
Uploading files (e.g., permit PDFs) via the website.
